content.detailedDescription:
This is a 2 night event.

i was running a combine and had known that my father was bringing me food.  it was a calm cool night and stepped out on the deck of the combine and wanted to look at stars till he got there.  the combine was facing north so i was able to see the north star and such.  all of the sudden i see a ball of bright white light moving from the ne to sw.  as it got closer i had noticed that it was moving erratically.  this is hard to explain.  if you draw a straight line on a piece of paper,  then draw 2 more lines an inch ubove and below that line.  now this ball of light followed the middle line. yet as it moved i noticed it would go up really fast to the top line then go to the middle line.  if you blinked you would miss it,  it happened fast.  also would do it to the bottom line.  it would also move really fast then go really slow if it was on the middle line, almost to the point it would stop but would not stop.  now this got me thinking if i could hear any engine noise.  at the closest point to me it was pry 5 miles and would be maybe a mile high.  i heard no noise from it at all.  the cool night with no wind would have carried that noise and there was nothing.  i listened really hard for something but nothing.  would blink my eyes and shake my head to see if i was actually seeing that.  this was as bright of white light as i have seen.

day 2, 3 days later

i had gotten done with cutting corn for the night and went out behind our farm which was 1 mile north of where i was on the combine 3 nights before.  i go out hunting for anything in the back of the farm place with a spot light and my 22 caliber.  about the same time of night i happen to look to the ne and i see the exact same thing, same direction, same flight path.  only this time i was 1 mile closer.  cool, calm night, just like 3 days prior.  i could not hear a thing coming from it.  i am looking at it in awe as it went from ne to sw.  right after it got straight north of me i thought about shooting the spot light light on it.  so to the nw of me a little bit i did.  that middle line on that paper,  it stayed on that line after that going at a constant speed.  i shined it on the object a second time and a flashing light come on.  i think to make it look like a plane.  still no sound.  but to make that object go from erratic movement to constant speed and a flashing light just by shining a spot light on it baffles me to this day.
content.summary: 2 night event, shined spot light on ufo and it changed what it was doing

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my parents home at or around 8:40 pm, in brazoria county near ouster creek, texas. my father was out on the deck and talking to the neighbors across the canal when he noticed a bright ball of light in the sky. the neighbors saw it as well. my father yelled to my mom, girlfriend, daughter and i to come look at the " ball of light in the sky." when went outside i saw a large, round, red glowing ball in the southern sky. it was stationary in the sky for about a minute. my girlfriend and my daughter ran inside to get a camera(iphone) and binoculars. then it started moving slowly to the southwest.  after moving to the southwest for about 15 seconds, it's size shrank and disappeared as moving away. the shrinking and disappearing happened in about 2-3 seconds. my girlfriend and daughter didn't make it back outside before is disappeared. while i watched the object, i knew that i was not seeing an airplane or helicopter. the sky was completely clear. the object was over land and i am sure it was not a signal/distress flare. the beach is more than five miles away.  i was fascinated by the object and i didn't feel that we were in any danger. i'm not sure what the ufo was, but i am sure that it was something extraordinary.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright fire ball like orb

content.detailedDescription: Was at work talking with a co worker at approx midnight. observed a light headed westward in the sky. the light made an immediate 90 degree northward turn. gained rapid excelleration the disappeared. all in less than a minute. failed to report due to profession.
content.summary: Flight west with an immediate 90 degree turn north and rapid acceleration then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Piqua, ohio friday october 2, 2015, had to be after 11pm but before i went to bed around midnight.  i know this because i was waiting for notification of my aunts passing.  i let the dogs out in backyard and noticed the sky was dark except a few lighter clouds and dismissed them as part of a weather system we were expecting in ohio, it was windy and had been drizzling rain.  the lights were behind the clouds passing at very high rates of speed from the northeast to the southwest.  at first i suspected a spotlight, but i began to count as each one passed and lit up the clouds.  there was no set pattern.  i looked online today to see if there was perhaps a meteor shower. there was none.  dogs were wanting in and out, remaining out more than wanting in, which is odd as it was drizzling and they would normally want to remain indoors.
content.summary: Dark sky with several white/gray clouds with lights behind passing swiftly ne to sw no sound no pattern as i counted between passes

content.detailedDescription: I was using my gopro to make a time lapse movie of the sunset in an open field. there were some ducks flying in the area attempting to land in a nearby pond. additionally there were two commercial aircraft in the distance leaving a trail which i though would look cool once i got the movie together. a couple of days later i decided to put the movie together and i was going through the pictures to make sure i didnt have any of those ducks in the photos. i noticed on g0028388 a small rectangular object that looked to be reflecting light from the sun. at first i thought it was one of those ducks flying around but then i zoomed in to 400 percent and seen that the object had angles to it.?? i did some playing with the photo using different color filters and come to an initial conclusion that it was not a duck in flight. g0028389 then shows a small white spot and under different filtering shows to be some sort of object that moved slightly to the left. g0028390 same thing. photos were taken in order 5 seconds apart. not sure what to think of it all. just wanted to share it with you. g0028391 is one of the ducks flying around. the sun is reflecting just right to make it look as if it has a spotlight.
content.summary: Gopro photo for time lapse of the sunset (5 sec intervals) / object in photo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my whife has seen several times two ufos red in color flying high in the sky around 11:00pm straight towards the moon an disappeared without any sound. one night around the same time as usual we hurd a loud helicopter had to b military whith no lights on.But to get to the point we look up an see the orbs of red flying tword the moon again but this time their was an airplane behind them almost like giving chase at same time the helo. was flying  very low at the same time at a different direction. the ufos dissapeard to the moon like allways again. the jet was still visible afterwards. haven't seen them since weird.... dryden virginia
content.summary: Jets and helicopter giving chase to two ufos dissappering twords the moon...

content.detailedDescription: I was out on back deck, just finished watching a fireworks show from a festival, then a little after that i noticed a red light that seemed either like a bright red star or round type sphere.  to me it did not have any points or jagged edges to it.  it was above the tree line in the sky while i was facing north,  i watched it for what seemed like ten to fifteen minutes while it did not seem to move at that time, if it moved it might have gotten higher up in sky.  then after that time it slowly moved south to southwest direction going in front of my house,  then i watched it vanish.  i live in a small town called schuyler, right north of interstate 90, so it started north then moved south towards interstate 90 but vanished before the interstate, as my home backs onto interstate 90.
content.summary: Red sphere shaped object that hovered for about fifteen minutes then moved then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I went to sleep before my husband that night. nothing out of the ordinary had happened, i don't drink or party. i was fully asleep until i awoke. no noise woke me, just a suddenly woke up. i then stared towards the open closet side of our bed. something was leaning on the bed,i stared at it for only a few seconds.It looked like an average "grey" alien, but it didn't have the elongated head. or the small mouth. it had a bigger head, bald, with the room being dark i couldn't tell if it was grey or a weird dark green. when i looked at it two things happened, it started to smile, but it looked like it was the first time it had ever tried smiling before. it's face wrinkled around the big toothed smile. at the same time the eyes,a dull yellow, started to glow. when i say "glow" i mean it looked like the eyes were putting off this yellow mist. it got brighter and brighter until i fell asleep. normally, i am the person to freak out about these things and run and find someone to protect me. but for some reason, i wasn't afraid of this thing. i simply woke up after that and it was morning. i've had other things happen while sleeping in that room before, but this time i remember the face. and i don't think i'll be forgetting anytime soon.
content.summary: Awakened by a quiet, smiling, glowing eyed "person".

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and when i walk i always look up, as i am a star gazer, i emmediatly knew that i was looking at something un natural,i have witnessed many astronomical events in my life both day and night , from massive meteor events to celestial eclipses,i have never made claims of the redicule and have always been a skeptic , i have seen the iss both naked eyed and with scope, and confirmed that it was over the indian ocean during this even , besides not in the same flight orientation , my wife came out and i yelled at her to look up, and she saw these lights as well, they flew in a v formation as they appesred from the north heading south , but the light began moving around , changing formation , as they moved across the sky to the south , these were not meteorites as i said, the lights had a dim glow to them not sharp bright light of such an event ,there was no sound, and the movement , from horizon to horizon was less then 30 seconds , very fast...
content.summary: I am an avid star gazer , and have never seen anything like this

content.detailedDescription:
driving home from el paso, tx to alamogordo, nm around 11pm.  the weather was on/off thunder storms. i was alone on hwy 54, just crossing nm boarder when i noticed two orbs behind me.  because it was dark, i though i was finally getting traffic. i watched as the orbs came close then backed off. as though it was speeding up the slowing down.  i was on cruise control so i was steady. 
  it came close and i thought the car/truck was going to pass.  i was confused because the orgs changed to were i though car then maybe a truck.  then it backed up really fast.  the second (and last) time it came close to me, i turned off the cruise control because i wanted control not knowing the road conditions and thinking some crazy kids were driving erratically. at first glance, i thought it was a car, then again, as it came closer may a truck but when it was just at my left shoulder i though it was a huge semi and really close to my truck... 
  i thought it was going to pass it stayed on my left side for maybe a minute but seemed forever. i was mad and getting scared that i may get into an accident
  i got tired of being played with so i pressed the breaks. then the lights went straight up.  i didn't see the orbs again and i was only a few miles away from orogrande, nm.  
  every family member i told, they said they were ufos.  i told them i believe there is an electric fence along hwy 54 because of the base and with the electrical thunderstorms prevalent, it stands to reason there was a lot of static electricity. yet, i cannot excuse the fact the orbs went straight up when i applied my breaks as though intelligent action was taken.
content.summary: Orbs seem to be playing with me

content.detailedDescription: My entire company during basic training was awaiting drill sergeants for nightly dismissal. turned around and saw a fleet of blue orb-like ufos in behind the barracks over the woods near some hillsbdoing zig zags. more than 10+, couldnt count them exactly since there were so many and they moved too fast. these craft had to be doing thousands of mph doing zig-zags, 90° and other sharp angular maeuvers. they moved in a straight line, point to point manner and did not stop or slow down to make these angular maneuvers. almost immediately before our drill sergeants came out to dismiss us, they basically abruptly slowed down and "drifted" behind a hill when the drill sergeants emerged from the barracks out of sight. once inside the barracks for the night, i personally had extra duty and was cleaning all through the barracks. of course i went straight to the windows to see if the objects were still there/returned. they did. i watched them for around almost an hour out the back windows of the barracks in the same direction as before outside. still performing impossible maneuvers continuously. they never went away, instead after about an hour or so, i became to frightened to continue watching. i sought out the d sergeant on cq duty for the night and managed to hang out in the d.S. office until extra duty, once i was allowed to go to my rack to go to sleep, me and another soldier checked out a window in that same direction, as i was still too frightened to be alone. they were finally gone. had another experience witb my company during our final field training exercise. completely differemt craft this time. very large orange orb at night. looked like a second full moon (it was either a full moon or very close to it) in the sky. only hovered a couple hundred yards away from out bivouac, a couple hundred feet off of the ground. several times that night it would appear silently out of nowhere, hover for long perilds of time and then slowly drift behing a hill and be gone only to reapear in the sky half hour to an hour later. there were flares in the sky all night simultaniously with it and can say with extreme confidence it was absolutely not on those flares. very very strange way to experience my bct and introduction to the army.
content.summary: In army basic training awaiting dismissal. entire company watching blue, slighy bigger than starlike fleet of ufo doing zig zags everywhere.

content.detailedDescription:
i was working on my computer at home at 5:00 pm today, oct. 3, 2015. the computer faces the ottawa river overlooking quebec, the usual area where i have seen ufos in the past 4 years when all of a sudden i noticed a strange area in the sky.  it was still very much daylight of course but in the clouds there was this vertical column of rainbow.  it's the only way i can explain it.  it consisted of rows of the regular rainbow colors but it wasn't bent in an arc like a regular rainbow and it was only about what to me looked like a few feet high from here - which of course is far from the actual height of this phenomenon.  when i looked through my binoculars it was actually two vertical masses of 'rainbow' one parallel to the other - like rainbow blobs - so to speak.

it was the strangest thing i have ever seen and the other weird thing was that it lasted almost an hour in that same spot.  it got a little dimmer, maybe clouds passed in front of it or it dimmed on it's own, but it wasn't long til it was back to full rainbow color strength.

instinctively i had this feeling that this was just not right and that something else could well happen so i kept an eye on it when i was working on the computer. about a half hour into it, now about 5:30pm ish i picked up my binoculars and looked at the rainbow-like blobs and i was stunned to see these two huge contrails that went from a cloud above the rainbow blobs straight into the middle of the two rainbow things and at that moment they appeared - two long black narrow what looked like ufos.  they were parallel to each other, very close - belly to belly kind of and they were pointed on an angle almost straight down to the river but slightly angled upwards as if they would fly together down a bit then leveled off.

i didn't see them disappear or go anywhere else as i put the binoculars down to catch my breath and when i picked them up again they were totally gone leaving the rainbows behind.

these two black thin ufos were huge, the way some describe the size of them to be like 2 football fields long.  they were very thin as if they were totally seen from their edges and they were slightly raised in the middle as if domed but slightly.

when i have seen other forms of ufos i haven't been afraid but i have to say this sighting freaked me out.

this sighting has really shaken me up and has put the last sighting of a triangle of orbs far behind in comparison.  these two ufos today were just gigantic.  it almost looked as if they had entered through this rainbow portal or something.  they didn't fly in from anywhere else in the sky at all they just came from the huge cloud above the rainbow blobs through the centre of the two short rainbows kind of halted there for a bit belly to belly then they were gone.

would be interesting to know if anyone has ever seen this rainbow blob thingy before too?  i sure haven't.

later on in the evening around 6pm i noticed another two short vertical rainbows like the one i described above but didn't notice anything in it although i had to attend to other things so didn't really look as closely as i did with the first pair of vertical rainbows.
content.summary: Around 5pm on oct 3, 2015 noticed a short vertical rainbow high in sky.  seemed very odd and lasted for almost an hour and then about a half hour into watching it with binoculars saw two large black discs the size as big as two football fields.

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped outside of my door in las cruces new mexico. looking east over the mountains to observe the storm that was passing through, i noticed a fairly large fireball floating over the mountains to the east, a little to the south of the white sands missile range. it caught my attention because it was very bright, pulsating, and clearly not an aircraft that i was familiar with. after checking the flight schedule for the halloween air force base, which is about 100 kilometers to the east, i saw there was no scheduled flights today. i watched the objects describe a path which covered approximately 10 miles, including changes in elevation and direction, reversal of direction, and hovering. ufos are common in this area. i observed the object for approximately 30 minutes, at which point it descended behind the mountains and was lost in the clouds. i did not especially think anything strange of it, because unknown aircraft are fairly common in this area, particularly to the east of the city where there is a nasa base, and the white sands national airspace which is restricted from civilian use
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: large fireball of varied paths over the mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was at golden gardens park , in the parking lot ,looking out at puget sound.It was a warm september evening . there were many people out on the beach with several bonfires going . music and laughter were in the air...It was dark and the sky was clear.At around 8:20 i noticed an orange-yellow orb coming out of the north , passing by the beach ,and continuing to the south ,going right over seattle , about 20 minutes away by car. i instinctively knew it was a ufo and immediately got my journal out of my truck and began noting what was going on. the second one came by at 8:30 and then in 5,10, and 15 minute intervals until 10:10 , a total of 13.The beach-goers became quiet... the ufos were flickering,orange-yellow orbs with radiating shards of yellow light emanating from the top. they were about 1/8 mile out over  puget sound , maybe 1,000 feet up.I could see and hear the jet traffic going in and out of seatac airport,about 35 minutes away , but the orbs were silent.As the 3rd one came by,i signaled to it with a small , hand-held flashlite. it seemed to slow a little and i thought to myself "i wonder what they are doing ?" immediately the word "conference"came into my mind...I think they contacted me! most of them seemed to be following puget sound as a flitepath . one made a 90 degree turn and headed west at the same altitude.But here is the kicker : one blasted-off , straight up , with 3 noticeable speed-changes.It"wiggled" from side-to-side as it went and kept it's color until after the 3rd speed-change,at which time it became a black dot , and then disappeared ! that blew my mind ! i've been studying ufos for 43 years and had never seen one in person . what an initiation ! ! !
content.summary: 13+ orange-yellow orbs seen passing overhead during a 110 minute time period. 1 object ascended & disappeared into a black dot& then vanished.I

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happened over 20 years ago and has seemed to only come back to me over time.  for years i thought it was a vivid dream but now i am wondering if this really happened to me and it was blocked from my memory when it happened.

 my father and i were deer hunting with bow & arrow on the border of illinois and wisconsin near jo daviess county, illinois.  my age was approximately 14 - 15 at the time of this event.  i had a deer come under my tree stand and took a shot.  i waited for my father to return to my tree stand as he was about a mile away in his own tree stand.  this was well after dark.  i told him that i took a shot and we proceeded to follow the blood trail together.  as we were walking through the field following the trail.  i observed a violet light hovering over the tree line going from left to right.  i told my father and he didn't pay much attention because he was following the blood trail and told me to quit messing around.  i shined my flashlight at the light and it darted off toward the woods very fast.  after some time the trail stopped and my father said we would resume search in the morning but he though i probably had a brisket shot to low and wasn't going to get the deer.  that night we ate dinner cooked by the coleman stove and got ready for bed in the back of his old 1973 chevy pickup.  it had a metal cab on the back and i remember windows on the side and in the back.  my dad snored loud and i remember him snoring that night.  as i was laying in the back of the truck at some point of the night or early morning.  i remember having a frightening feeling that someone was watching me to the point i didn't want to open my eyes.  i did and through the side window saw what i think was the big eyed big head grey looking back at me.  i closed my eyes again and heard what was like a mechanical voice telling me "we are not going to hurt you" then something made me open the back window of the truck cab and get out.  when i did i observed three short and two taller big head big eyed aliens and a disc shaped craft landed in the field about 200 feet from the truck.  i remember the little ones touching my fingers and leading me toward the craft and saying "do not be scared" in a mechanical voice that seemed to be in my head.  that is all i remember.  i woke up in the back of the truck and thinking boy was that a vivid scary dream and it has bothered me since it happened.  to this day when i see a image on tv or other of a big head big eyed grey alien it sends chills down my spine!
content.summary: Abduction while deer hunting / communicated with mechanical voice / short and tall abductors

content.detailedDescription: My wife noticed 2 red objects glowing which were next to each other she then called me outside and they made no sound and were hovering no blinking lights whatsoever and then they blinked out one at a time and the first one after the red glow stopped you could see very plainly a round shaped disc shoot up at a 45 degree angle then the other did the same and followed the first object up.These 2 objects were not helicopters,planes,or anything i have ever seen and i was in naval aviation in the military.They both were indeed ufos,nothing else but.We just watched them glow red not blinking,just a solid red glow,and when the red glow shut off you could see the shape of the disc as round,and the rate of clinb was as if they were defiying gravity easily with great speed.
content.summary: My wife called me out and we saw 2 solid red objects hovering  then blink out and the outline was a disc round both took off at 45 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: Returning home at approximately 3:45pm i had my cell phone on its camera function as i had just stopped to take a pic of the clouds after a storm that had just blew through. it was monsoon and would occasionally storm complete with high winds and hail. on the side street before i turn onto my street there was a tree limb that had fallen during the storm. as i was driving, i only stopped for a moment to take a pic of the fallen branch. as i got home a few minutes later i showed my husband the photo and we both saw the object in the sky well above the neighborhood and although seemingly hazy as if cloaked by clouds it is clearly below the clouds.
content.summary: I stopped to take foto of a fallen limb in the street. arriving home showed husband and saw the object

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen and heard, kind of felt loud booms. asked my husband if he heard them, t.V. was on, he said he didn't. went out side and to the east, over the san jacinto mountains the sky had very high cloud formations that drifted toward the south and thinned out. the rest of the sky was very blue, bluest i've seen in long time. the clouds were all swirling around, the eastern thicker ones looked like waves and as they drifted south swirled around each other. it was really very beautiful, could still hear, feel booming sound. not quite as strong as sonic booms tho, couldn't tell where they were coming from. just stood out there watching the clouds which filled the sky from behind the mountains and up very high in the east. then i noticed a dark object chasing, or following a very bright object. squinted my eyes and then could see that the dark one was a plane or jet, could see the wings tail etc. against the white clouds. the other object i could see no detail of it's shape, i mean no wings, tail, it was sort of cylindrical like the fuselage of the jet but only about half as big. it was very bright tho, showed up clearly against the clouds. the jet was just about alongside of this object. i ran in the house and grabbed a pair of binoculars, i have two pair for bird and star watching. when i returned and found the jet and object again the object seemed to be chasing the jet. it was right on it's tail, the jet seemed to be trying to shake it, not major turns just kind of weaving left and right. this was to good so i went back inside to get my stronger binoculars. i knew that my phone and my digital camera would do no good, it was to far away and by the time i would be able to get one of them i would have lost the scene anyway. which did happen, when i returned i couldn't find them again. but i stayed out there and kept looking at the clouds. after a few minutes i saw the jet again, they had been heading south, coming from the east, now the jet was going back the way it had come. it was moving in a giant arc, kind of circling, and i lost sight as it went behind the huge trees next door. a few minutes later i saw another jet coming from the south going almost in the same flight path as the first jet. the rest of the day there helicopters going back and forth. i continued to watch the clouds off and on for a couple hours, hoping to see that thing in them somewhere. i did see a very long straight chem trail going into the clouds from very in the east and disappearing in the south. the swirling nature of the clouds was something i don't think i've ever seen, swirling around each other going straight up until they just disappeared. i could see how something could hide or disappear in them easily.  the booms went on all day until you could feel them more than hear them. then that went down to just seeing water vibrate in the water cooler a couple times an hour. it was a very strange, cool day. i should have reported this that day, but i thought maybe that object was some kind of other plane. then today i saw another report on this sight from moreno valley, which is about 6-7 miles north of here. that person, on the same day as me, saw a bright silvery object heading south and then saw 2 jets take off from march a.F.B heading in same direction. i would very much like to know just what was going on.
content.summary: Observed plane / jet seemingly chasing smaller silvery object. jet was almost alongside of object that was approx half it's size. went inside and got binoculars, when i returned the object seemed to be chasing jet, who seemed to be taking evasive action.

content.detailedDescription: They were on there back deck after dinner saw two objects thought they were ballons  but as they got closer they said they were disc shaped silver with flat bottoms three lights on each  two were travelling  together and one heading towards them like it was catching up to the other two  could here some kind of noise off them.  they said they have never seen anything like them before   the wife said the lights were illuminating
content.summary: My neighbours saw this   three disc shaped  flat bottom  three lights on bottom lights  shinning down

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i had just left valley of fire nv. i snapped the picture because i liked the way the mountains looked like waves. later that day i went in to edit my pictures and noticed this bright light. didn't notice it when i took the shot. we were moving at the time. the object is on the mountain and was many miles across the valley from the road we were on. in the picture the object seemed to be moving as it appears to be leaving a trail of light.
content.summary: I did not notice when i took the picture noticed when i went into pucks to edit shots.
content.locationName: Valley of fire state park, Arizona

content.detailedDescription:
It was early in the hockey season. teams had just been selected and pre-season exhibition games were being played in minor hockey around the province. our london ontario team had travelled to nearby stratford ontario (about 45 minutes drive away) for one of these exhibition games. it was so many years ago, but i believe i was around 10 years old at the time, which places the year at 1979. i believe i was in the major atom age grouping in hockey which aligns with the date estimate. 
our optimist club sent all the major age group teams to stratford that day, so the major atoms would play followed by the major peewees, followed by the major bantams and so on. my brother being 2 years older played on the major peewees which meant that after my game, i had to wait around for my brother's game to finish. it had to be either a friday or saturday because i had been given permission to have a sleepover with a friend from my hockey team. my friend and i killed time in the arena while my brother played his game.  as my brother's game came to to the final buzzer, i asked my dad if i could have the car keys to go out to the car with my buddy so we could listen to the radio while waiting for my brother to get changed after his game. my dad, probably eager to get us out of his hair, tells me not to start the car, then hands me the keys. it was a fairly mild october night because my friend mike and i rolled down the front windows of the car, and sat on the car door "window sills" so that we're able to look at each across the roof, while the radio is playing. there we are in the parking lot of the stratford arena, sitting in the windows, listening to the radio, when it happened... 
from behind a tree next to the parking lot, a large angular "square" of light suddenly appeared. it looked to be just behind the tree or about 50 feet away, and i'm estimating was about 20 or 30 feet in length on all sides. this was not a light like you see coming from a typical light source, but rather it was like looking into the sun but without any eye irritation, pain, or squinting. the "square" was completely pure and uniform white with no part dimmer than any other-- as i try to describe it today i would say that it looked almost like an sliced opening in the fabric of space. there were no discernable edges around the white light, it was just a huge sheet of pure whiteness. time seemed to stand still at the time, as i have difficulty remembering the sequence of events after we first saw the light. i remember the light just disappearing and mike and i running inside the arena in fear to find my parents. of course we tried to share our experience with my parents, but we were not taken too seriously -- which really looking back isn't all that surprising.  what might they have done? they acknowledged that we saw something, but they didn't see it themselves, and we looked to be unharmed.  so what was there to report? and to who?

the next part though, is even more strange to me. as we weree driving home back to london, maybe just a few minutes after leaving stratford, out of the star-filled sky (at about the 10 o'clock position), another "square" of white light flashes right above the car we're driving in about 100 feet away, and instantaneously retreats back into the sky (to the same area it came from), all within a what seemed like a microsecond. it was almost so fast that you could not detect it's motion path. this time the adults with me saw it. i told them that is what we saw in the car in the parking lot. they said they had no idea what that could have been, then there was a long silence afterward, and we didn't really talk to much about afterward.
content.summary: Large square of pure white light appears twice, the second time ascending into the night sky.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was just walking up to the front of my house with my fiance and good friend. we had just returned from the grocery store. it was relatively clear out and the first light caught my eye as it was moving in an abnormal fashion and the light was fairly bright. when i first noticed the object, i figured it was the local police helicopter making its rounds but then i took a closer look and realized that the lights were moving to quickly and making maneuvers that a helicopter couldn't possible manage. after noticing the first lights my fiance pointed just to the right and a little bit higher then first, a second set of lights appeared out the the sparse clouds which looked identical.

both sets of lights had 4 red lights that were in a diamond shape and seemed to change shape into a rectangle and then back into a diamond. the lights on both light anomalies would be blinking and pulsating red, once in awhile a white light would pulsate in the middle of the 4 red lights then disappear. the white lights would only appear approximately every 30 seconds then disappear. the 4 red lights looked as if they were rotating in clockwise motion as they flew around in the sky and when the stopped the rotations would stop. the first light anomaly was just a bit lower in the sky then the second, maybe by about the length of 3 full size semi trailers long. and the second set of lights were about 100 meters away to the right. the first set of lights were moving slowly from left to right. once the second set of lights appeared, it quickly moved towards the first set and stopped abruptly just above it. the two sets of lights just hovered briefly then both took a short flight in opposite directions quickly before making a sudden stop then returning in each others direction but crossing ones path. they continued this pattern for about 7 mins before the second set of lights quickly took off the the south east and disappeared. once the second set of light was gone the original set of lights made it's way south before i lost sight of it for approximately 2 mins in the clouds that had started to form. i seen the lights again not to far from the original location, just a little more south. i observed the lights for a few more minutes, the lights were moving from west to east rather fast in a straight flight path. during the last few minutes, all lights were on (4 red and the middle white) the middle light did not blink at all, it was very bright and the red lights seemed to dim slightly. i lost sight of the lights as it became very overcast and the lights were flying just above the clouds. 

when i first seen the lights and realized i was looking at a ufo of sorts, i became very excited as i am a sky watcher and am very interested in ufos and the unknown. my reaction was to keep looking up and pay close attention to everything that was happening, so that i could recall the even in detail. after my fiance and friend witnessed the second set of lights take off, they both entered the house as they were both paranoid to stay outside any longer. once i finally entered the house, i was surprisingly calm and collected after observing the light anomalies. (this was not the first time i have seen strange things in the skies. i have had 7 other accounts of strange objects and lights that i could not explain over my life time, and most of them have been in the past 5 years)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observed 2 individual lights moving around in the sky for approximately 40 mins

content.detailedDescription:
As i was watching a show with my daugter i was disturbed by a light in my eyes, i thought it was my daughters cell phone and as i thurned to tell her to shut her light off i realized the light was coming from out side behind her.
i then thought what the heck? my heart started pounding faster and was mesmerized for a moment. them lights are really bright and at tree level, i jumped up to try to see what was creating the lights, l could not see out the front door so i ran out the back where my girlfriend, son and his girlfriend were. i ran past them as they were asking what was going on i did not say a word. my son followed me as i ran around the house to get a better look at the lights and they were gone! 
at that time my daughter in the house tried calling my sons girlfriends phone, it rang and she answered but the phone just made a weird sound that both girls could hear. then my son thought he seen lights headed to the south east. could not confirm my self.
approx 15 min after i saw the lights 4 military jets, l am assuming from galord airforce base, came flying trough heading in a south east direction and we could see them flying around for about a half hour before they headed back the same way they came.
content.summary: Watchin tv two bright orangish lights shined in through the window in my eyes, then affected cell phones

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting

saturday 9-26-2015 @ 2320-2323 hours

location: 4173 harding street, dearborn heights, mi 48125

event lasted approximately 3 minutes as timed by cell phone recorded date and time functions. 

i just got home from a family function and went to look at the full moon as the blood moon eclipse was to happen the following day. 

i saw 3 or 4 bright orange orbs in the sky traveling slowly from the south east to the north west. 

they were pretty close in proximity but not in formation and were diverging from each other slightly then returning. 

they appeared to be separate and distinct entities with very fluid motion. 

no light trails visible in any direction emanating from them. 

they appeared to be low in altitude and i lost them shortly due to the tree line of surrounding vegetation. 

they appeared to be small in diameter orbs or spheres. 

i have seen stars, satellites, planes, auroras, etc and this is the first object i have seen like this.  i am a retired navy police officer and have seen many celestial phenomenon while at sea.
content.summary: I saw 3 or 4 bright orange orbs in the sky traveling slowly from the south east to the north west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out coming back from an after bar get together. i was by the police station ready to turn left to go home when i saw a big triangle craft with a blue and white light under it. i thought i must be tired.  the object had passed me and moved over the train tracks. it made a sound that was nothing i've heard before.

i followed its direction and went through the underpass, i didn't have to go far.The triangle flying thing was hovering without moving over the brown house.  the flying triangle didn't move when suddenly from the bottom of it a big beam came out and filled the brown house with light! 
i tried to pull out my phone but it didn't work.  suddenly another object that looked like a 3 d hexagon type appeared out of nowhere.  it manifested in the sky like spent hung hiding would .  the blue light from the triangle one stopped beaming into the house but the house still glowed blue from the inside out.  the big sphere / hexagon landed in an empty patch of land flanking the house.   i drove into the alleyway and saw that a blue light was beaming from the house to the landed ship. then i saw figures walking or floating through it. i couldn't make out what they were.  they looked human. but some l weren't.  the only following the people were smaller . 

the triangle ship disappeared.  i stayed up until now because the sphere/hexagon that landed was still there. it was coming in and out of invisibility. in the end - a beam came out of the ship to the house and this time only 3 figures floated into the home and then the blue light was gone.  the triangle came back and the hexagon entered the triangle ship

after the ships left i saw 2 military helicopters fly over the area - 
my contact information is false. except for my first name. i don't want to be associated with this: i reported this because i know a family lives in that brown house.  please do not attempt to contact me
content.summary: It hovered for 30 min over a brown house and landed

content.detailedDescription: September 28th 2015 at 1 o'clock i observed a light towards the wrightwood mountains for about 15 minutes it got brighter deimer brighter dimer and then eventually disappeared the next day i tell my family they kind of laughed at me that night my brother goes to work at night he tells me i see the lights you're talking about and i was like don't be lying to me you don't be making fun of me and he goes no dude if you go outside you can see it i go outside and now it's facing east about five minutes later my neighbor comes out to go to work and he's like what is that and i was like i don't know about 5 minutes after that my cousin calls tells me the same i call the operator sheriff's department tell him it's in the eastern sky he lets me know that he does see it he has no idea what it is and that was the end of the call then the next day i see all the news san bernardino riverside san diego county also the same thing. can i have the video of both nights if you would like to see it
content.summary: Around orb getting brighter in denver brighter in denver and then eventually this in the disappearing i have it on video

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were relaxing in the back yard when we noticed three objects hovering about 70 degrees from the horizon, approximately a mile away.  they moved together, formed one larger sphere shape, then separated again, forming a triangular shape.  what caught our attention was the flight pattern and the unusual color.  they didn't make any noise nor did they flash--they were a dull white.  they were moving quite fast, making abrupt direction changes.  they moved from nw to sw before disappearing out of sight.

i went to get a video camera while my wife continued to watch, but they had disappeared before i could get footage.
content.summary: Three "orbs" separating from one, transforming into triangular shape, then separating again.

content.detailedDescription: Was out observing the sky as i do almost every night now. around 8 pm. i spotted a starlike object moving very slowly. wasn't flashing. very solid white light. and no sound. i asked my boyfriend to come out and watch it with me. and he seen it also before it disappeared. it is a nice night out and no clouds. i do have a pic of it. what i could get of it. i blew the photo up and sharpened it. so you can see it.
content.summary: Seen a starlike object move from west to east. not flashing.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my bus stop for school around 6;30 when i noticed a large light (at the time not moving) at first i thought it was a star but it began slowly moving in my direction for about 10 seconds, then it extremely abruptly changed directions to my left and moved out of my vision.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white light hovering, slowly moving, then abruptly changing direction

content.detailedDescription: First night, saw flashing object in night sky. was not at a high altitude from our observation. green, red, orange alternating colors. but was odd and made us more curious. also this object whatever it is, stays stationary. ( hovering)   there was other air traffic in the area and you could clearly distinguish what is expected to be seen as to what is out of the norm. second night found same object, same colors, same behavior, however higher in the sky. third night october 2nd once again found same object position roughly i between last two. this time i had a telescope. what i saw was something round, it appeared to spin or rotate. basically a disc with balls of light spaced evenly emitting the colors described earlier. through magnification i could only make it out. obviously this is something not man made, a rare visual find. to the point where we felt compelled to submit this report. maybe it's nothing, maybe it is. but in my opinion it falls under the strange out of the ordinary, unidentifiable!
content.summary: Flashing object that remained in one spot for over 2 hours , 3 days in a row
